## Metamorphic Guard VS Code Extension

This lightweight extension ships editor snippets for:

- Registering `@task` specifications
- Defining `Property` and `MetamorphicRelation` instances
- Bootstrapping CLI commands (`metamorphic-guard evaluate`)

Install by running:

```
code --install-extension metamorphic-guard-snippets-0.1.0.vsix
```

Snippets live under `tools/vscode-extension/snippets`.
